name: Algebris Investments
overview: Algebris Investments (UK) LLP is the Investment Manager to the Algebris Global Financials Master Fund. The Fund was launched in 2006, primarily investing in equities, to express views in the markets, and occasionally the top tiers of the credit structure where the risk return profile is preferable. The team consists of two portfolio managers, Eric Halet and Davide Serra, two traders and six specialized financials analysts. Algebris has offices in both London and New York and will be opening an Asia based office in Singapore later this year.
